title: x/net/context: TestAllocs fails on windows
body:
from http://build.golang.org/log/e3fff27c33ead120fed34e603536c9847de4b81e

--- FAIL: TestAllocs (1.01 seconds)
	context_test.go:349: WithTimeout(bg, 1*time.Nanosecond) allocs = 9.000000 want 7
FAIL
FAIL

It is not clear why 7 is expected and not 9.

Alex
